trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSC810_01034_SEQ_00<tab>Sthalrhet hopes to send you out on a hunt.
TEXT_GAIUSC810_01034_SEQ_01<tab>Sthalrhet asks you to eradicate sea wasps so that his brother will not have the opportunity to delight in them.
TEXT_GAIUSC810_01034_SEQ_02<tab>Deliver the sea wasps you have culled to Sthalrhet.
TEXT_GAIUSC810_01034_SEQ_03<tab>Sthalrhet savors his brother's misfortune, and is happy to give the sea wasps to anyone who is not Nortmoen.
TEXT_GAIUSC810_01034_TODO_00<tab>Slay sea wasps and obtain their rotting umbrellas.
TEXT_GAIUSC810_01034_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the rotting umbrellas to Sthalrhet.
TEXT_GAIUSC810_01034_STHALRHET_000_000<tab>You seem an adventurer in need of work, and here I am a man in need of dead sea wasps. Perhaps we might help each other.
TEXT_GAIUSC810_01034_STHALRHET_000_001<tab>Mind you, I've no interest in chewing on the viscous vermin myself, but my brother can't seem to get enough of them, the uncouth cad.

TEXT_GAIUSC810_01034_STHALRHET_000_002<tab>I'll not stand to watch him stuff his gob full of those prickly pests one more day! Ah, what I wouldn't give to see the look on his face when I tell him you've hunted down all his precious sea wasps! But don't expect me to reward you without proof─I'll need to see their rotting carcasses first.
TEXT_GAIUSC810_01034_STHALRHET_000_010<tab>I trust you're busy delivering those sea wasp souls to the deep? Just make sure you don't give their corpses to my brother!
TEXT_GAIUSC810_01034_STHALRHET_000_020<tab>Now this is what I deem a proper slaughter! Excellent.
TEXT_GAIUSC810_01034_STHALRHET_000_021<tab>All that remains is to determine how to dispose of the wretched things. I suppose there must be somebody in my brigade that can stomach them...
